name: Strawberry Margarita
description: The quintessential summer drink, bursting with juicy strawberries. It’s made in 30 seconds, has less than half the sugar than store-bought syrups, without questionable ingredients. Whether you’re lounging by the pool, biting into a taco, or hosting a summer soirée, this refreshing drink is the berry best.
preparation:
1. In a blender, add strawberries, ice cubes, water, mix, and tequila, if using.
  2. Blend on high until smooth and incorporated. Divide into two glasses and serve each with lime wedge, if desired.
  3. If desired, moisten rim of each glass with lime wedge and dip rim in salt; rotate glass gently to evenly coat.
tips: Swap rum for tequila to make a strawberry daquiri!
